channel.title: Apples on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Apples on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Apple Crisp For 200
item.description: Kids and adults love apple crisp for dessert. So easy to make and goes with any meal. Schools, camps, and churches love this recipe. Apple Crisp for 200 People Apple Ingredients 8 #10 cans sliced apples (water pack) 16 c. sugar 16 tbs corn starch 8 tbs cinnamon 8- 2″ full size hotel pans Apple Directions place 1 can apples, (do not drain) in each pan and even out.

item.title: Apple Pie Recipe
item.description: Apple Pie Recipe Apple Pie with Michigan Apples is Quick to Prepare and Easy to Eat. Using Fresh Apples for This Apple Pie Recipe, Tops off any Meal, Top that with Vanilla Ice Cream or Cheese. Quick Apple Pie Ingredients 1 pkg Pie crust for 2 crust pie, 9″ 6-8 Michigan spies, or granny smith apples (peeled and thinly sliced) 3/4 c sugar 1 tsp lemon juice 3 1/2 tbsp quick tapioca 1/8 tsp salt 1 tsp ground cinnamon 1/8 tsp ground nutmeg 2 tbsp butter, melted Apple Pie Directions Press one crust in pie shell, don’t trim

item.title: Apple Smackers Recipe
item.description: Apple Smackers Recipe Serves 4 3 tart apples 3 tbsp sugar 1/2 tbsp cinnamon 2 0z. butter, melted Apple Smackers Directions Peel apples and cut in wedges. Place wedges on microwaveable plate. Brush melted butter over apples. Combine sugar with cinnamon, then sprinkle over apples. Cover with wax paper or plastic wrap and place in microwave for about 5 minutes. Check for tenderness. Eat em up.
